page.title: 08Housing In New Milton
page.content: Business in the New Milton area is good because a lot of old people come,here to retire,most of them buy bungalows and flats.40% of our area is residential.A house takes a long time to sell it usually takes three to four months before the other people move in.30% of people decide not to sell or buy at the last minute,mostly because of surveys.Many people work in an Estate Agency.100-150 people visit Estate Agents every day.The Estate Agent we visited advertise every week in the local paper.Estate Agents never refuse to sell a house.The most expensive areas are Barton Sea front,Beaulieu and around Barton Common.The least expensive estates are for first time buyers.The price of houses range from about Â£30,000 to about Â£150,000.
